query.value: SELECT * FROM cmis:document where CONTAINS('PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:testSiteSearch/cm:documentLibrary/*"') AND cmis:name='file1.txt'
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder where CONTAINS('PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:testSiteSearch/cm:documentLibrary/*"') AND cmis:name='folder2'
SELECT * FROM cmis:document where CONTAINS('PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:testSiteSearch/cm:documentLibrary/*"') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder where CONTAINS('PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:testSiteSearch/cm:documentLibrary/*"') ORDER BY cmis:name DESC
SELECT * FROM cmis:document where CONTAINS('PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:testSiteSearch/cm:documentLibrary/*"') ORDER BY cmis:lastModificationDate ASC
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder where CONTAINS('PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:testSiteSearch/cm:documentLibrary/*"') ORDER BY cmis:createdBy DESC
SELECT * FROM cmis:document where CONTAINS('PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:testSiteSearch/cm:documentLibrary/*"') AND cmis:name IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM cmis:document where CONTAINS('PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:testSiteSearch/cm:documentLibrary/*"') AND CONTAINS('file 1 content')
SELECT * FROM cmis:document where CONTAINS('PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:testSiteSearch/cm:documentLibrary/*"') AND cmis:name LIKE 'parent%'
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder where CONTAINS('PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:testSiteSearch/cm:documentLibrary/*"') AND NOT(cmis:name NOT IN ('parent-folder3'))
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder where CONTAINS('PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:testSiteSearch/cm:documentLibrary/*"') AND cmis:name IN ('parent-folder3', 'folder2')
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder where CONTAINS('PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:testSiteSearch/cm:documentLibrary/*"') AND cmis:name NOT IN ('parent-folder3', 'folder2')
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder where CONTAINS('PATH:"/app:company_home/st:sites/cm:testSiteSearch/cm:documentLibrary/*"') AND cmis:name <> 'folder2'
